definition: surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)
to excuse sb/to exempt/to remove or dismiss from office/to avoid/to avert/to escape/to be prohibited

sentences.english: The results of the appraisal shall be taken as the main basis for appointing or removing reserve officers.
sentences.chinese: 考核结果作为任免预备役军官职务的主要依据。

sentences.english: The advisers shall be appointed or removed by the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.
sentences.chinese: 顾问由全国人民代表大会常务委员会任免。

sentences.english: The appointment, dismissal, promotion and demotion of civil servants in the recruitment system shall be provided for separately.
sentences.chinese: 聘任制公务员的职务任免与职务升降，另行规定。

sentences.english: Head Coach hirings/firings are now tracked in the Transaction Report.
sentences.chinese: 主教练的任免情况可以从交易报告中获悉。

definition: to remove sb from their post/to dismiss
to relieve sb of his post/to sack/to demote/dismissal/sacking
to act as a substitute/to act on sb's behalf
